words.def: to an extreme or greatly exaggerated degree
an episode of such pastoral or romantic charm as to qualify as the subject of a poetic idyll
Someone or something that is remarkable or unusual.
a wild primitive state untouched by civilization
a musical composition that evokes rural life
the capability of conscious choice and decision and intention
any liliaceous plant of the genus Lilium having showy pendulous flowers
aromatic Old World herb having aromatic threadlike foliage and seeds used as seasoning
(ethnic slur) offensive term for a Jew
either of two folds of skin that can be moved to cover or open the eye
an often persistent bodily disorder or disease
a state in the Rocky Mountains
a soft silver-white univalent element of the alkali metal group
